title: Have we just found the new Jonathan Dimbleby?
text:
What an inspired choice Chris Mason is as the new presenter of Any Questions? (Friday, Radio 4), following in the grand footsteps of Jonathan Dimbleby, who stepped down in June.

Mason, who is also a BBC political correspondent and one of the four members of the Brexitcast presenting team, was probably offered the job because, like Dimbleby, he has the air of being a fair and decent sort of person. These are essential traits for the format of live discussion between people with profoundly differing views, which always has the potential to crackle into nonsensical rage at any moment. That’s just an ordinary Thursday night on Question Time, but thankfully rarer on Any Questions?
